publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3546 Bill Kidd: Wood News is Good News—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of £870,000 in Scottish Government funding that is to benefit over 20 urban woodland projects across Scotland, including a community event that is to take place at Heathcote Avenue, Drumchapel, during National Tree Week and the Drumchapel Woodland Group, which has received £3,700 in order to take on a part-time volunteer coordinator; notes the importance of such projects in boosting the sense of pride and community in local areas, and commends the ongoing hard work and commitment of all those involved in such projects.

S3M-3546 Bill Kidd: Wood News is Good News—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of £870,000 in Scottish Government funding that is to benefit over 20 urban woodland projects across Scotland, including a community event that is to take place at Heathcote Avenue, Drumchapel, during National Tree Week and the Drumchapel Woodland Group, which has received £3,700 in order to take on a part-time volunteer coordinator; notes the importance of such projects in boosting the sense of pride and community in local areas, and commends the ongoing hard work and commitment of all those involved in such projects. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Butler*, Alasdair Allan*, Bob Doris*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*

S3M-3546 Bill Kidd: Wood News is Good News—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement of £870,000 in Scottish Government funding that is to benefit over 20 urban woodland projects across Scotland, including a community event that is to take place at Heathcote Avenue, Drumchapel, during National Tree Week and the Drumchapel Woodland Group, which has received £3,700 in order to take on a part-time volunteer coordinator; notes the importance of such projects in boosting the sense of pride and community in local areas, and commends the ongoing hard work and commitment of all those involved in such projects. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Christina McKelvie, Bill Butler, Alasdair Allan, Bob Doris, Joe FitzPatrick, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Robin Harper*, Sandra White*
S3M-3546 Wood News is Good News (lodged on 25 February 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3546 Wood News is Good News (lodged on 25 February 2009) Angela Constance*
